name: Manu's Adventure
description:
Manu's Adventure is the first game developed by me.

You will encounter a difficult but simple challenge throughout the game while awaiting new enemies and traps every 2 level so it doesn't get boring!

10 Levels total are planned for the final release each in wich you have to collect 25 coins to unlock the door!

It also has a little and yes i mean little funny story.

Have fun and stay tuned because i will take this away from you... there will be sequels that hopefully will leave Manu's Adventure in the shadows!

Current Version: 1.0
